H0.text: Who tried to steal Christmas from the town of Whoville. Scrooge

H1.text: Who tried to steal Christmas from the town of Whoville. Jack Frost

H2.text: Who tried to steal Christmas from the town of Whoville. Krampus

H3.text: Who tried to steal Christmas from the town of Whoville. Grinch

A4.text: He breaks into the Whos' homes on Christmas Eve while they sleep to steal everything they own, and dump it off from a nearby mountain.
